Download Free Minimal Genesis WordPress Child Theme

Mar 21, 2014
1 minute read

Looking to Download a Free WordPress Theme for Genesis? Grab Nominal from Github

Nominal has a less is more approach. The Minimal child theme expresses everything you’re about, with very little effort.

  • Custom Header
  • Custom Featured Images
  • Footer Widget
  • HTML5 Markup
  • Mobile Responsive
  • Threaded Comments
  • Previous and Next Post
  • Landing Page

Again – this minimal Genesis Theme – Nominal – is free.
